attributes.action: To award a posthumous decoration of the highest order to Cpl Stewart Mclaughlin of 3rd Battalion The Parachute Regiment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Corporal Stewart Mclaughlin was killed in the battle for Mount Longdon during the Falklands War. It is widely believed by his collegues of the Regiment and by many war historians that Cpl Mclaughlin showed outstanding bravery and leadership beyond his rank during the battle for Mount Longdon.He has never been officially recognised for his actions, he undoubtedly saved the lives of many men that night. For a detailed account of this outstanding soldiers actions please see the book "Green Eyed Boys" by Christian Jenning & Adrian Weale. It is a national disgrace that he was not decorated at all!
